insights.finding: Custom authentication annotation without validation or access control logic
insights.recommendation: Enhance @CurrentUser with validation logic using an annotation processor. Consider adding role-based checks and audit logging for security tracing.

insights.finding: Direct use of @AuthenticationPrincipal without additional security context
insights.recommendation: Wrap @AuthenticationPrincipal with additional security context checks. Add session validation and user context verification.
Add comprehensive JavaDoc explaining security requirements, usage patterns, and potential risks when using this annotation.
